entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Documentation and capabilities for filtering tests to run are inadequate #99384
  • [mono] box related IL instruction sequence optimization for interpreter #99379
    9.0.0
  • [8.0][wasm] Failure in CalendarTestBase.TestJapaneseCalendarDateParsing affecting several globalization tests #99378
  • Nullable value type corrupted on Arm64 #99377
  • Dotnet segfault in libSystem.Security.Cryptography.Native.OpenSsl.so #99368
    Future
  • [Wasm][Interp] mono_raise_exception implementation problems #99366
  • Exclude all cgroup.cpp variants from build on non-linux Unix OSes. #99363
    9.0.0
  • Add package readmes to shipping libraries packages #99358
    9.0.0
  • The project does not have a valid ProjectGuid. WorkerExtensions.csproj #99352
  • KESTREL System.InvalidOperationException: Handle is already used by another Socket. #99348

Closed

  • Consider memoizing more CNG properties on CngKey that can't change after the key is finalized #89821
    9.0.0
  • `AssemblyBuilderAccess` has no `Save` enum and `RunAndSave` enum #99224
  • Added `needs-breaking-change-doc-created` label because this issue has the `breaking-change` label. #99342
  • .NET Blazor App high memory usage under Linux #90163
    Future
  • Wasm SignalRClientTests timing out #99268
  • mono_os_mutex_destroy: pthread_mutex_destroy failed #97565
    9.0.0
  • EventListener doesn't support expose embedded structures on Runtime events #12678
    Future
  • Reduce coreclr and clrjit sizes on macOS via -Oz and -fno-unroll-loops #13073
    Future
  • .net TLS 1.2 enable Ed25519 in signature algorithms extension #98067
  • Are only AMD64 and I386 hosts supported for the Linux cross-architecture component? #96608
  • GetHostAddresses() on MacOS #99333

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ParamCollectionAttribute #99385
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve perf\allocs of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #99383
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Make Thread.VolatileRead and Thread.VolatileWrite obsolete #99382
    area-System.Threading
  • [mono][jit] Emit instances when using unmanaged generic calli in gsha… #99381
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Shipping internal package for webcil #99380
    area-Build-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #99376
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99375
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #99374
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • NativeAOT: Add win-x86 support #99372
    arch-x86, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP] Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: profile checking through loop opts #99367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce overheads of enumerating Grouping from Enumerable.GroupBy #99365
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • Improve the throughput of SocketsHttpHandler's HTTP/1.1 connection pool #99364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add helper method for updating bbTargetEdge #99362
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][mt] Disable hybrid globalization for multithreaded runtime #99360
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99357
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Enable building tests with UseLocalAppHostPack=true #99354
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix initReg usage in genPushCalleeSavedRegisters #99353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Test on ci #99351
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Helper files for Arm64 SVE design #99349
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Marshal resolved/unresolved tasks separately #99347
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update analyzer to use FeatureGuardAttribute #99340
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Fix InlineArray and some other corner cases in Swift lowering #99337
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • Handle MakeGeneric APIs in dataflow #99037
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Memoize some CngKey standard properties #99053
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix FormatQuantiles formatting in MetricsEventSource #99045
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Set assets manifest metadata for assets that get shipped with .NET release #98991
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [mono][jit] Avoid an assert when using unmanaged generic calli in gsh… #99355
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Restore erroneously removed encoding of the argument count in a generic method instantiation #98825
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.4
  • Update branding to 7.0.18 #99323
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.29 #99322
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 8.0.4 #99324
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Expanded & clarified BerConverter tests #98676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, test-enhancement
  • Add FeatureGuardAttribute and FeatureSwitchDefinitionAttribute #99338
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Narrow some visibility in Enumerable #99361
    area-System.Linq
  • Reuse x86 GC and unwinding code in NativeAOT #99109
    arch-x86, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Set /DEBUGTYPE:CV,FIXUP on Windows binaries #99356
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 8.0.4
  • JIT: Expand flow graph debug checking #99238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add BP_1A to BQ_2B, BU_2A #99245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() should respect [ActivatorUtilitiesConstructor] #99175
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Small clean up in assertprop (casts) #99311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Set /DEBUGTYPE:CV,FIXUP on Windows binaries #99282
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser][MT] fix nested synchronous JS interop call detection #99296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix Promise cancelation race condition #99259
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][docs] Custom ICU build does not require `IcuTracing`. #99346
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Remove Current interface call in IteratorSelectIterator #99344
    area-System.Linq
  • [mt][browser] `SignalRClientTests` avoid timeouts #99303
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [RISC-V] Use getUnrollThreshold() to get unroll limits #98798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] OSR: Fix calculating remainingSPSize in genPopCalleeSavedRegisters #99288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Skip EventPipe cleanup on mono unless runtime is shutting down #99332
    area-Diagnostics-mono
  • [workload-testing] Add properties for nuget.config path, and target t… #99277
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • fix commands for debugging coreclr with lldb #99345
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Pass --target in preprocess_file() #99251
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Simplify Environment.FailFast QCALL #99316
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Delete stackwalk cache #99137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix extra stack frame on exception stack trace #99263
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • List exact regs killed by ByRefWriteBarrier on AMD64 #99134
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix stack walking for new EH #99262
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix bugs related to jiterpreter heuristic #99273
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #99169
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [NO REVIEW] correctness test for a perf improvement #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98385
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Set assets manifest metadata for assets that get shipped with .NET release #98989
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add ProducesNetCoreAssets property to Publishing.props #98988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98384
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Check if AttributeData for InterfaceTypeAttribute is not null in ConvertComImportToGeneratedComInterfaceAnalyzer #98873
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.4
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Home float parameters before integer parameters #98749
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98383
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • [browser] Debug RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations times out #98981
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Remove INS_SCALABLE_OPTS_SHIFT #99258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [runtime] Infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Super instruction tweaks #99319
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • [ws] Fix debugging web socket JS code + add test #99240
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: inline shared generics with runtime lookups inside #99265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • ILCompiler: support publishing using a non-portable ILCompiler build. #99148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Enable NativeToManaged wrappers to get compiled with LLVM #96910
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fixed: null reference instead of assert on failed reflection in CookieExtensions #99309
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Delegate bug fixes #99185
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Avoid generating linker range extension thunks #99208
    arch-arm32, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete unused System.Runtime.Versioning.CompatibilitySwitch #99270
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add ILLink/ILCompiler support for feature checks #99267
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fixed: potential AV in MethodTableBuilder::FindDeclMethodOnClassInHie… #99295
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workload Install Type Can be Incorrect with Manifests Authored for Younger SDKs #39275
  • Update tests to accommodate https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/9748 #39266
  • You must install .NET to run this application / .NET location: Not found #39259

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't use the xunit return code when running in helix only #39271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [IP] add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [release/8.0.2xx] make globalized, AOT apps no longer require nightly #39267
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39262
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39260
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #39247
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • make globalized, AOT apps no longer require nightly #39195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove getX MSBuild flags from restore invocation #38956
    Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, 8.0.4
  • Ensure watch supports environment variable directives #39022
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, 8.0.4
  • Trim trailing .git from sourcelink repo urls in container generation #39161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39228
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39236
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.118 #39221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.204 #39232
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add an image digest label to generated containers #39160
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update branding to 6.0.421 #39220
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.129 #39219
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use a more reasonable timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938
    Servicing-consider, Area-Containers
  • [StaticWebAssets] Compress all assets by default #39213
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add MSI Installation Tests #38782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Write the full path of the dotnet tools directory in /etc/paths.d/dotnet-cli-tools #35411
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608
  • [Proposal]: Params Collections #7700
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Publish notes from extensions WG 2024-03-05 #7986
  • Collection expressions: inline collections in spreads and foreach #7864

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tracking issue for any pull diagnostics coordinated insert work. #72428
  • IDE0001 (Simplify type name) suggests removing Nullable<T> where behavior changes #72420
    Backlog
  • Select clause sometimes copies range variable to local in generated method #72417
  • Analyzer warning when using default value expression for structs that contain reference types which are not nullable #72415

Closed

  • IntelliSense confused by Action<> overloads #63339
    17.6
  • `GetRelativePath` in `PathUtilities` crashes with IndexOutOfRangeException #72043
    17.10
  • "IDE0054: Use '++' operator" appears in inappropriate contexts #72422
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeStyle 4.9.2 not compatilbe with the current net6 SDK docker image #72418
  • Freshly created editorconfig gets duplicated rules added when file is open in VS #72382
  • Simply opening .editorconfig file makes significant changes to the file for C# settings #68683
    17.8 P4
  • rule severity does not overwrite rule options and default analyzer severity #72413
  • INamedTypeSymbol.StaticConstructors is empty for metadata types #72379
  • Switch expression with mixed type and property patterns results with MSB6006 "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 #71660
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the List(int) constructor if possible when lowering collection expressions #72427
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure obsolete diagnostics about required constructor or Add method is suppressible. #72426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Use AsyncBatchingWorkQueue instead of TaskQueue #72425
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Reduce thread contention on ProjectSystemProject._gate #72424
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Standardize our Powershell code #72423
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for PrimaryConstructorBaseType to SpeculativeAnalyser #72421
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix log contention issue #72419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP (try2): Attempt at reducing the file I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder. #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Misc. work for params collections #72408
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • GetRelative paths accepts paths shorter than the base directory #72166
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations required to create a TransformNode #72375
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix compiler vsix deployment #72321
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge 'main' into RefStructInterfaces #72416
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Bind `allows` constraint clause #72386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Patterns: Allow non-negative and full integer sets to merge (intersect or union) #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Mark two additional features as completed #72387
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Remove legacy incremental-analyzer implementation of TaskList. #72315
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove legacy incremental-analyzer implementation of TaskList. part2 #72406
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update semantic token refresh queue. #72402
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove flags controlling diagnostic mode. #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Setup OptProf profiling for LanguageServer.Protocol #72404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bind extensions in initializers of inferred locals #72398
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Reduce closure and Lazy allocations inside CSharpCompilation.ctor #72371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #72305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Better BlobBuilder pooling #72383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge the finally block during data flow analysis #72361
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Squeeze down the size of the skeleton reference cache. #72403
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement SegmentedCollectionsMarshal #72395
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations under RemoteAssetProvider.SynchronizeAssetsAsync #72229
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Small allocation optimization in StateTable.Builder.ToImmutable #72364
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delay create the SkeletonReferenceCache #72365
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make sure to meld string or char constants in expression in interpolated string into adjacent literal & Use `String.Concat` if possible in interpolated string in VB #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve behavior of SyntaxRemoveOptions.AddElasticMarker #72255
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove code for arbitrary diagnostic taggers #72409
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Health Check Causes Memory Leak in .NET 8 #54405
  • Link Generation - Incorrect Route Template Matching with literal in path #54403
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, single_query #54402
  • MVC view with _framework/blazor.web.js doesn't import *.lib.module.js #54397
  • Feature request: ViewComponent bind attributes to public properties #54396
  • source-built aspnetcore fails during node build on RHEL8 #54394
  • source-built aspnetcore fails during rollup on ppc64le #54393
  • Perf regression: plaintext, updates #54392

Closed

  • Milestones - Inconsistencies #52113
    9.0-preview3
  • Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #50802
    9.0-preview3
  • Add FallbackTestPseudoElement property to LinkTagHelper #52529
  • Perf improvement: json #54364
  • Dependabot npm registry url is incorrect #54360
  • Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App template in VS2022 17.9.2/Net 8.0.201 with MIP when published to Azure logout => 404 => '"undefined" is not valid JSON'' #54391
  • Blazor Stream Rendering not working on Azure Web Apps #54390
  • Converting existing Blazor Hosted project to Blazor Web App resulting in missing index.html #54313
  • Documentation for integrating azure b2c on blazor interactive mode auto .net 8 #54310
    9.0-preview2
  • Quarantine ComponentDisposeMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit #46836
    9.0-preview3
  • Quarantine `ClosingTheBrowserWindow_GracefullyDisconnects_TheCurrentCircuit` #44185
    9.0-preview3
  • JSInterop: Handle that rejected JS promises can be any type. #54383
  • Perf improvement: single_query #54381

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_TestSink test from retry list #54406
    area-infrastructure
  • fix: remove double logging of BadHttpRequest errors #54395
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e4fdb87` to `31993df` #54398
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • Fix `LocationChangingHandlers_CannotCancelTheNavigationAsynchronously_UntilReturning` #54388
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview3
  • [release/8.0] Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53930
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.4
  • [release/8.0] Delete markdownlint workflow #54042
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.4
  • [release/8.0] Update CODEOWNERS #54043
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Update Nuget dependencies #54142
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.29
  • [release/8.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54240
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54241
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.18
  • [release/6.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54242
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.29
  • [release/8.0] Introduce a read-only mode for data protection keyring consumers #54266
    area-dataprotection, Servicing-approved, 8.0.4
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `31993df` #54400
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.29
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `31993df` #54399
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.4
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `31993df` #54401
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.18
  • Update branding to 7.0.18 #54379

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS Publishing ignores bundle identifier and uses project name instead #21060
  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped #21059
  • [META] Xcode 15.3 Support for .NET 8 and MAUI #21057
  • Rendering Failure of Custom Controls on Mopup Page in Android Due to Clipping Issue #21056
  • It is not possible to unfocus an Entry and HideSoftInputOnTapped closes soft keyboard but does not remove focus from Entry #21053
  • CarouselView on Android - "Cannot access a disposed object" #21049
  • Add MoveToRegion(MapSpan span, bool animated) to IMap interface for non-animated map positioning. #21046
  • Label with HTML TextType does not display images on Android #21044
  • On `RequestedThemeChanged` from device on `Windows` the `FlyoutItem` text is not changed #21042
  • XAML errors frequently do not reference the file with an issue #21038
  • Switching to an existing page with SetTitleView used in Flyout menu causes "Element is already the child of another element" crash on Windows in MAUI 8.0.6 #21037
  • [Windows] Label Padding property is not updated properly #21035
  • Child Span does not inherit TextColor or FontAttributes from parent Label #21034
  • [MAUI][.NET9] Searching on the “Search all recipes page” will cause the app to crash. #21033
  • [MAUI][.NET9] Clicking on any recipe page shows blank #21032
  • Custom Renderers just don't work. At all. #21030

Closed

  • KeyboardEventArgs attributes Code is "" and Key is "Undefined" on mobile Android. #16030
  • Calling API method to retrieve byte array fails in MAUI Android app #19980
  • iOS not show splash screen #20171
  • .Net MAUI iOS app install but does not update #20868
  • App crash with PlatformView cannot be null here #17871
  • NullReferenceException in Platform.DidAppear on iOS when migrating from Xamarin Forms. #17133
  • Unable to get command line arguments in .NET 8 MAUI Blazor Hybrid Project #21058
  • When Entry control get focus app crash #21051
  • Entry property TextTransform = TextTransform.None does not work on iOS #21024
  • Creating MAUI Blazor Hybrid App #21043

PullRequests

Created

  • Update repo documentation to reference Policy Service instead of FabricBot #21063
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] [net9.0] Fix maui query attribute support #21062
  • [net9.0] Fix maui query attribute support #21061
  • [main] [net9.0] Fix templates #21055
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • [Trimming] Fix ILLink warnings in source generated code #21054
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 2/2) #21052
  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 1/2) #21050
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Catalyst] Fix Image not rendering in Mac Idiom (Device family = 6) Button #21048
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, control-button
  • [net9.0] Fix templates #21047
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/localization
  • Bump editorconfig csharp_prefer_braces down to suggestion #21041
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Disable auto updating on device and better prepare logcat #20732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Small fix for WebAuthenticator TaskCanceledException API docs #21040
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, t/docs 📝
  • Update GitInfo.txt 8.0.10-preview #21026
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update GitInfo.txt for SR4 #21027
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Revert to 1.4.240211001 #21031
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Move net9 to preview3 #21011
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Updated

  • [Windows] Add scrolling tests for virtualization w/ Datatemplates #20954
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • RadioButton being Garbage Collected #20472
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [Android] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQL Server: Should retry on 203 #33260
  • Trigger issue with variable or temp table in OUTPUT-INTO clauses #33259
  • EF Core 8 Query Translation Bug: Array operations with union #33258
  • How to have only One Column for ForeignKey in one-to-one relation with two entity to one TPH entity #33257

Closed

  • EF Core ExecuteUpdateAsync Can receive Expression<Func<T, T>> UpdateColumsExpression ? #33256
  • Remove lazyLoader in JSON when selecting only a single object #33223
  • Refer to Enable Detailed Errors in Exception Messages #33222
  • LINQ query is failing in VB.NET same query works with same EF in C# #33214
  • 无法在项目设置里关闭mac的目标框架 #33204
  • Increment DateTimeOffset with value converter #33190
  • Invalid migration Code and Snapshot code #33125
  • InvalidCastException when using Proxies on two different subclasses from the same class with the same id value (TPC strategy). Am I doing something wrong? #33120
  • DbSet.Add causes failure if called after lazy loading related entity #33041
  • Does nullable reference types enable affect the runtime null checks? #33245
  • Make all SQL expression nodes quotable #33008
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #33254

Merged
